Package org.codehaus.plexus.util

Class AbstractTestThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.plexus.util.AbstractTestThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public abstract class AbstractTestThread
extends Object
implements Runnable
    A thread which is registered with a ThreadRegistry and notifies it when it has completed running. Collects any errors and makes it available for analysis.

    Created on 1/07/2003

    Since:
    3.4.0
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Bert van Brakel

    • Method Detail

      • getError

        public Throwable getError()

        Getter for the field error.

        Returns:
        a Throwable object.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the test back to it's state before starting. If the test is currently running this method will block until the test has finished running. Subclasses should call this method if overriding it.

      • start

        public final void start()
        Start this TestThread running. If the test is currently running then this method does nothing.

      • getErrorMsg

        public String getErrorMsg()
